text: Chto kasayetsya bogatykh neveruyushchikh i bednykh veruyushchikh, privedi im (o poslannik!) pritchu, rasskazyvayushchuyu o dvukh muzhchinakh: veruyushchem i neveruyushchem. Neveruyushchemu My darovali dva sada iz vinogradnykh loz, ogradili ikh pal'mami dlya pol'zy i dlya ukrasheniya, a mezhdu etimi dvumya sadami nizveli plodorodnyye posevy
